name: TT Donation Checkout for WooCommerce
author: Terry Tsang

sections.description:
A WooCommerce plugin that allow user to add customer donation/tip amount option for WooCommerce checkout.

In WooCommerce sidemenu, there will be a new submenu link called ‘TT Donation Checkout’ where you can:

  • Enabled / Disabled the option
  • Change “Message” to any text
  • Change “Button Label” to any text
  • Change “Title” to any text
  • Change “Default Amount” to any amount
  • Choose “Taxable”
  • Change “Minimum Donation/Tip Amount” to any amount

Features

  • Implement an donation/tip checkout for any order
  • 2 languages available : English US (en_US) and Chinese (zh_CN)

Translation

  • Do search and install this plugin ‘Loco Translate’ (https://wordpress.org/plugins/loco-translate/) for translation. You may add new language by accessing Loco Translate > Plugin > Add New Language. Do check out this guide on how to translate the plugin.

GET PRO VERSION

  • TT Donation Checkout PRO for WooCommerce

DISCOVER OTHER WOOCOMMERCE PLUGINS

  • TT Discount Option for WooCommerce
  • TT One-Page Checkout for WooCommerce
  • TT Extra Fee Option for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire woocommerce-donation-checkout folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘WooCommerce’ at left sidebar menu and update the options at Tab TT Donation Checkout there.
  4. That’s it. You’re ready to go and cheers!
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial Release
  • Allow user to donation/tip for any order before checkout

short_description: A WooCommerce plugin that allow user to add a donation or tips at the checkout page.
